node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Bram | Tech Blogger on September 18, 2021. May be an image of laptop, screen and text.

node.text:
Will you get the new iPad mini?😱 I feel like everyone kinda wants one now.😂
.
For real though, the new iPad mini looks so good!🤩 It got a new iPad pro like design, new internals and Apple Pencil 2 support!🤙
.
Fun fact: My very first iPad was an iPad mini 4 and I absolutely loved it!👏 The size of the iPad mini is just so good for content consumption!📺 
.
Highly recommend this little device if you’re looking for a small Netflix streaming device!🙌 It is small though, so I wouldn’t really want to do that much work on it.😅
.
What’s your opinion on the new iPad mini? Let me know in the comments!💬
.
.
.
Follow us: @appletodaynow 🤖
.
#ipadpro #ipadair4 #appleipadpro #ipadpro11 #ipadpro129 #ipadpro2020 #ipadpro2018 #ipadpro2021 #appleipadpro #ipad_pro #appleipad #ipadair4 #ipadmini #ipadmini6 #ipados #applefan #applefans #applefanboy #applefamily #appletechnology #techie #techies #techielife #wallpaperdesign

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Bram | Tech Blogger on September 17, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.

node.text:
Let’s chat about the Apple Watch series 7!👏
.
The leakers were straight up wrong this time😂 We basically got 2 main features: thinner bezels and a more durable design🤙 Pretty great updates, but not enough for me to upgrade.😅
.
And like I mentioned before, the leakers were wrong!🤣 It was highly rumored that the Apple Watch was getting a squared off design, but that didn’t happen😅 Not that I mind though, I actually prefer the rounded design because it seems more comfortable🙃 I am pretty hyped about the thinner bezels though!
.
We also got some small features like faster charging and a brighter always-on display🔥 But those are already pretty great on the series 6, so that still isn’t enough for me to jump the wire.🤷‍♂️
.
Are you buying the Apple Watch series 7? Let me know in the comments!💬
.
.
.
Follow: @appletodaynow ✌️
.
#applewatchseries7 #applewatch6 #applewatch5 #applewatchmurah #applewatchlifestyle #applefans #applewatchse #applewatchseries #applewatchseries6 #applewatchnike #applewatch #applewatchseries4 #applewatchseries5 #applelife #applelifestyle #appleaddict #applewatch7 #apple2021 #appleusa #applewatchface #applewatchfans #applewatchstrap #appleevent #applewatch44mm #applewatch40mm

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Bram | Tech Blogger on September 16, 2021. May be an image of screen and phone.

node.text:
Let’s talk iPhone 13 and iPhone 13 pro!🔥
.
In my opinion, the iPhone 13 was a pretty basic update🤷‍♂️ We got some camera, performance and battery improvements and that was pretty much it😅 I personally wouldn’t upgrade from the iPhone 12 to this one.
.
The pro model on the other hand… pretty much the same😂 However, we did get promotion!😱 and the camera updates on the pro models are pretty great too (love that macro), so the pro models are actually a solid update for most people.👏
.
I’ll be upgrading from my iPhone 12 to the iPhone 13 pro as the iPhone 12 camera is really limiting me when I want to take a quick picture for my stories or Twitter🙃 I just really miss the telephoto lens and the macro mode on the 13 will definitely come in handy.👌
.
Are you upgrading to the new iPhones this year? Let me know in the comments!🤙
.
.
.
Follow: @appletodaynow 💥
.

node.text:
What did y’all think about the event?😱
.
I think it was a pretty solid event👌 We got some solid (although not revolutionary) upgrades across the board and we got a redesigned iPad mini!🔥
.
I will be covering each product in separate posts this week, so follow me to not miss out on any of that!👏
.
Have a great day y’all!🤙
.
.
.
Follow: @appletodaynow 🌌
.

node.text:
The iPhone event is today!😱
.
I’ll be covering the event on Twitter so go follow me on there if you don’t already😏 There’s link in my bio!🔥
.
Also, I’ll be going LIVE on IG with the one and only @mvxxwvllx after the event!🤙 This will be a great conversation so don’t forget to tune in!
.
Anyway I’m all set for the event!💥
.
.
.
Follow: @appletodaynow 🌟
.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Bram | Tech Blogger on September 13, 2021. May be an image of phone and screen.

node.text:
The iPhone 13 event is tomorrow!😱 Let’s go over my iPhone 13 wishlist!👀
.
The first feature that I’d like to see in the iPhone 13 (and that’s highly rumored) is a dedicated astrophotography mode✨ I’ve always wanted to learn how to do astro and I think this would be a great way to get started!🔥
.
Another feature I’d like to see is reverse wireless charging⚡️ This feature isn’t really rumored to actually happy, but I still have my fingers crossed🤞 It would just be so nice to charge my AirPods with my iPhone!🤩
.
And let’s not forget about the 120hz promotion display!🙃 There are actually A LOT of rumors about this so I think this will actually happen🤙 I’m wondering if it will also enable an always-on display though…🤔
.
What are you most looking forward to with the iPhone 13? Let me know in the comments!👏
.
.
.
Tap the follow button: @appletodaynow ✌️
.

node.text:
Have y’all tried out the AR apple invitation yet?😱
.
You can access it by going to Apple’s website -> going to “events” -> tapping on the apple logo of the invite.👌
.
And this time you can actually go inside the apple logo🤩 This event’s AR animation is definitely my favorite compared to the others!🔥
.
Have a great weekend y’all!✌️
.
.
.
Follow: @appletodaynow 🎥
.
#appleevent #applear #augmentedreality #augmented_reality #appleevent2021 #iphonefan #appleiphone12 #iphone12 #appleiphone12pro #appletech #iphone13

clips_music_attribution_info.should_mute_audio_reason: Instagram music isn't available in your region.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Bram | Tech Blogger on September 10, 2021. May be an image of phone and saddle-stitched leather.

node.text:
What a little editing can do! Swipe!➡️
.
Sometimes it’s really hard to see the potential in a picture😂 And that was definitely the case with this one… I didn’t know where to start, but when I hit the auto button it brightened up a bit and so I started tweaking a little more.👌
.
What basically turned out to be the problem with this picture were the color temperature, the tint and the saturation, who knew?!🤷‍♂️
.
Anyway, I’m really happy that this picture was shot in RAW because otherwise I would’ve been screwed.🤣
.
Quick question though: do you guys hit the auto-button every now and then?👀
.
Have a great Friday y’all!🤗
.
.
.
Follow: @appletodaynow 🚀
.
#lightroomedit #lightroomediting #lightroomtutorial #lightroommobile #ipadpro11 #ipadpro2018 #ipadpro129 #ipadpro2020 #appleipadpro #ipadpro #applecollection #applewatchband #applewatchbands #applewatchseries6 #applewatchfans #appleiphone12 #iphone12 #applehub #appledesign #appleforever #techsetup #applepro #cleanminimalism #techielife #lightroomphoto

node.text:
Do you use Siri? I do and here are 3 Siri commands I use all the time!🔥
.
1. “What song is this?”🎼 Not that long ago Apple bought Shazam an app that could recognize songs🙌 And ever since then you are able to ask Siri what song is playing!😱
.
2. Calculator stuff🤓 I probably use this feature a bit to often, but you can ask Siri to calculate stuff for you! You can also ask her to convert currencies, measurements, etc.!👏
.
3. Intercom🎙 If you own a HomePod or HomePod mini you can use the intercom feature👌 You just say “Hey Siri, intercom [message]” and an intercom will be sent to everyone in your house!🤩 No more screaming up the staircase.😉
.
What are your favorite Siri commands? Drop them in the comments!👇
.
.
.
Follow: @appletodaynow 👨‍💻
.

node.text:
The wallpaper though!🤩
.
PS: Apple announced its “California streaming” event yesterday!🔥 I’m so excited!😱
.
.
.

node.text:
The apple event invites are rumored to drop today!😱
.
At this event apple will likely launch the iPhone 13, Apple Watch series 7 and maybe even the AirPods 3.👏
.
This event will probably take place on the 14th of September online (that’s why the invites drop so late)👨‍💻 Apple’s past online events have been really well put together, so I’m excited to see all the smooth transition they made for us this time.👀
.
Show your hype for the iPhone event in the comments!🔥
.
.
.
Follow: @appletodaynow 🚀
.

node.text:
What OS update are you most excited for this fall?😱
.
I’m definitely most excited for iPadOS 15!🔥 I just can’t wait to redesign my homescreen with all the new widgets apple has made!🤩
.
Plus, that quick notes feature also seems like a really useful feature!🤙 What are you most excited for? Let me know in the comments!👇
.
Have a great week y’all!🤗
.
.
.
Follow: @appletodaynow 👨‍💻
